Title: From Bad to Worse
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Mark Banker (story by), Patrick McHale (story by), Kent Osborne (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Kent Osborne, Somvilay Xayaphone
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Niki Yang
Plot: The undead plague returns to the Candy Kingdom.
